## Methods


### Data source(s) (All types)
The North Atlantic right whale abundance estimates were taken from a published document [see @Pace2017], except for the most recent 2016 and 2017 estimates, which were taken from the 2016 NOAA marine mammal stock assessment [@Hayes2017] and unpublished 2017 stock assessment.



### Data extraction 
Data were taken from existing reports and plotted. 

### Data analysis
Analysis for right whale abundance estimates is provided by @Pace2017, and code can be found in the [supplemental materials](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/action/downloadSupplement?doi=10.1002%2Fece3.3406&file=ece33406-sup-0001-SupInfo.docx).
